title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.I. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
SR: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Observe the marking between the button and the list. 3. Observe the alignment of the top button with the dialog top.
